description:
Joshua is a cute, kinda bi, mostly straight, type of guy. He watched straight porn for
the solo, but my guess is he wont be nervous about working with a guy. Just not too experienced.
He is definitely a guy that no neat and tidy label will not stick.
He is SUPER nice, very easy to talk to, and eager to do more full-on work.
Joshua has a pretty good scar on the right side of his head from a childhood accident. Resulting in a bit of a lazy eye. That, and a propensity to shave his pubes (which he really didn't have enough time to grow out before the shoot) are his only drawbacks. He is tempted to use his porn earnings to fix the eye, but I think living expenses usually trumps this kind of "cosmetic: surgery.
Aside from that, he got way turned on by the solo and shoots an amazing load.
Joshua is keen on working with Ransom, so next week be prepared for an awesome "Serviced" video!
title: Joshua Cohen - Solo
